channel.title: Comments on: SQL University and why you should be attending
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Jorge Segarra
item.dc:creator: Jorge Segarra
item.description: I just wanted to say thank you for the kind words and great plug for SQL University! I hope everyone enjoys the project, it's been a lot of fun putting together.
item.content:encoded: I just wanted to say thank you for the kind words and great plug for SQL University! I hope everyone enjoys the project, it’s been a lot of fun putting together.
